skins.shipDescription: I am Swiftsure, a light cruiser of the Royal Navy... If it is not too much for one such as myself to ask, I would like to support your fleet in whatever way I can.
skins.selfIntroduction: I am Swiftsure, of the Royal Navy. I joined towards the end of the war, but with it winding down and fate taking some odd twists and turns, I wasn't able to perform as expected. If it pleases you, I will serve the fleet with everything I have. Oh, but if it doesn't, you need not worry about me...
skins.acquisition: I am Swiftsure, a light cruiser of the Royal Navy... If it is not too much for one such as myself to ask, I would like to support your fleet in whatever way I can.
skins.login: Good morning. Here is your work for the day... *Sigh*...
skins.details: Um, sorry I made such a mess... Sheffield tried to teach me how to clean, but I'm a lot worse at it than I expected... Ahaha...
skins.secretaryIdle1: Commander, let's work as hard as we ever do, eh?
skins.secretaryIdle2: Commander, do you think a Lady of the Royal Navy should be more elegant? Not like the maids, I mean Fiji and Jamaica... They stand out quite a bit... is that alright?
skins.secretaryIdle3: I envy the Knight Commander. If only I could comport myself so... Sorry about that. Forget I said anything.
skins.secretaryTouch: As your secretary ship, I am responsibile for everything in all of the reports.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Commander, um... I think fleet regulations call this kind of thing "inappropriate..."

skins.shipDescription: Commander, why are you here...? Me? Yes, as you can see, I'm still studying... I figured that acquiring knowledge would be the best way to make up for my lack of experience on the actual battlefield.
skins.acquisition: Commander, why are you here...? Me? Yes, as you can see, I'm still studying... I figured that acquiring knowledge would be the best way to make up for my lack of experience on the actual battlefield.
skins.login: Good morning. Here is the outline for today's course. Please make sure to review it.
skins.details: Unicorn, this is how you do this problem... Oh sorry, Commander, I'm currently helping the others study. Please make yourself feel at home.
skins.secretaryIdle1: Fiji, don't you know that studying is good for you? Come on, Commander, care to back me up on this one?
skins.secretaryIdle2: While I have served as a flagship before, that has nothing to do with what's going on now. I have to be humble and learn from everyone.
skins.secretaryIdle3: I often see Edinburgh in the library. She's always grumbling about what's going on in the maid team or something...
skins.secretaryTouch: I look cute when wearing glasses...? Err... Um, that wasn't my intention...
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Commander, I d-don't think you should be doing this at school... Ahh!

skins.shipDescription: I agreed to try on this outfit, but... I know these fancy outfits don't suit me... H-huh, I look gorgeous?! ...Thank you very much. Even if you're just trying to make me feel better, I appreciate it...
skins.acquisition: I agreed to try on this outfit, but... I know these fancy outfits don't suit me... H-huh, I look gorgeous?! ...Thank you very much. Even if you're just trying to make me feel better, I appreciate it...
skins.login: Happy Lunar New Year, Commander. Why don't you set aside your work today and take some time off?
skins.details: Hmm, what should we do next? Why don't we see if there's anyone who needs help...? Just sitting here idly somehow doesn't feel quite right...
skins.secretaryIdle1: Um, are you redecorating the office? Do you need me to help?
skins.secretaryIdle2: I got some red envelopes as gifts from my seniors in the fleet. Ahaha... I'm not sure how I feel about this...
skins.secretaryIdle3: Commander, the more free time everyone else has, the less free time you seem toD Um, oh my...
skins.secretaryTouch: If you're cold, p-please... feel free to use my shawl.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: C-Commander... What if someone sees us...?!

skins.shipDescription: W-welcome! ...Ugh, I'm still way too nervous... Ah, um! H-how may I serve you today, Commander...?
skins.acquisition: W-welcome! ...Ugh, I'm still way too nervous... Ah, um! H-how may I serve you today, Commander...?
skins.login: Commander, what will your first order be?
skins.details: So I need to put this headband on... I wonder what kind of hairstyle would be good? Um, let's tie my hair up like this... Actually, maybe twintails would be better instead?
skins.secretaryIdle1: Commander, is something wrong? ...Is this outfit really too stimulating, like Sheffield said it was...? Or... is it actually too conservative, like Fiji said it was...?
skins.secretaryIdle2: Everyone acts much more freely when they're at the beach. Do you think I should do the same? A-Alright, I'll give it a try... Y-Yo!
skins.secretaryIdle3: When I'm helping Neptune, I feel like a completely different person. ...Oh. What would you like to have, Commander?
skins.secretaryTouch: Um... This outfit really is quite embarrassing...
